section.title: Menu
section.para:
After logging into the eformsign dashboard Dashboard , click the menu icon (
) at the top left corner of the screen. Then, you will see the sidebar menu, as shown below.

note.para: Each menu may appear differently depending on the permissions you have. The company administrator can access all the menus and have all the permissions.

section.para: Each menu is as follows:

listitem.para: New document: New document Shows the template list where users can choose desired templates and start creating documents.
Documents: Documents This is is a cloud space for storing and viewing documents. It consists of the following three spaces according to the document status:
In progress: In progress Shows the list of documents you have created or processed but are incomplete.

Action required:
Action required Shows the list of documents you have temporarily saved or documents that other members have requested to you to sign or approve.
Completed: Completed Shows the list of all the completed documents you have created or participated in.

Manage documents: Manage documents Only document managers can access this menu. Document managers can view all documents created from a template that they have permission to access. The company administrator can view and manage all the documents.
My signature: My signature You can create and register your signature to be used when signing a document.
Manage templates: Manage templates Only template managers can access this menu. You can view the template list and configure template settings.
Manage company: Manage company Only company mangers can access this menu. You can view and edit company information.

Company profile:
Company profile You can view and edit the company information.
Manage groups: Manage groups You can create a group or edit group information.

Manage members:
Manage members You can invite members or edit member information.

Manage custom fields:
Manage custom fields You can add and configure custom fields such as company information, group and member information.

Notification template management:
Notification template management You can view and edit the email and SMS notification templates.
Integration: Integration Only company administrator can access this menu. You can connect eformsign with external services.
Cloud storage: Cloud storage You can connect your Dropbox, Google Drive, or Box accounts to store the completed documents in external cloud storages.

Analytics & reporting:
Analytics & reporting You can connect sheets in Google Sheets or Microsoft Office 365's Excel with eformsign to store the data filled in the eformsign documents to the sheets.

API / Webhook: API
Webhook You can create, edit, or delete the API and webhook keys to use the eformsign API.
Billing: You can view your plan and payment history, or change your plan or payment method.
Usage status: You can monitor weekly, monthly, and annual service usage status.

Download eformsign form builder: Download Form builder You can download the Foam builder installer. By using the Form builder add-in feature, you can create electronic forms using Microsoft Office files.

section.title: Dashboard
section.para: Dashboard The dashboard is the main page shown when logging into eformsign. In the dashboard, you can view documents that are in progress, require your actions, etc., and use shortcuts to go to the main menus including the New document page.

listitem.para: New document Provides a shortcut to the New document page where you can create new documents from existing templates.
In progress Displays the number of documents that are in progress. Click the In progress box to go to the In progress document page.
Action required Displays the number of documents that require your action. Click the Action required box to go to the Action required document page.
Completed Provides a shortcut to the Completed document page where you can view the completed documents that you have created or participated in.

Displays the recent three documents in the list and the number of documents in progress. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the In progress document page.

Displays the recent three documents in the list and the number of documents requiring your actions. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the Action required document page.
Displays the recent three completed documents in the list. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the Completed document page.

tip.para: You can add a template that you frequently use to the Favorites list to create documents easily using the template. You can add your Favorites on the dashboard.

listitem.para: The list of templates that are not added to your Favorites will be displayed in the pop-up window.
Tick the checkboxes of the templates you want to add to the Favorites.
Click the Select button, and the templates will be saved as your Favorites.

section.title: View and Change Basic Information
section.para:
My profile To view your personal information that you entered when signing up for the eformsign service and your company information, click the icon (
) at the top right corner of the sidebar menu.

figure.title: Location of the Menu Icon for Accessing the Personal and Company Info

listitem.para: Change company: Change company If you are a member of multiple companies, click the Change company menu to view the list of your companies and select the company to change.
My profile: My profile You can view and edit your personal information that you entered when signing up for the eformsign service. You can also view the company information that you are a member of.
Logout: Logout You can logout the eformsign service.
You can view and edit name, email or ID, password, and contact number of your eformsign account.
You can link, or unlink your social accounts in Google and Facebook.
You can view whether you agreed to receive marketing emails. You can also change your selection.
You can delete your eformsign account by clicking Delete the eformsign account.
You can view basic information about your company including company name, country, language, and contact number.
You can view detailed information about your company including company address, company registration number, homepage URL, and company administrator’s email.

note.para: You can only view the company information on this menu. If you want to edit the information, go to the Manage company > Company profile menu. Only the Company administrator or company managers can edit the company information.

listitem.para: If you want to withdraw from the company, click the Withdraw from this company button. Then, the list of companies that you are a member of will be displayed and you can select a company that you want to withdraw from.

important.para: Even if a member withdraws from a company, the member can still use the eformsign account and join another company or create a new company.

However, if the company administrator withdraws from the company, the company also will be deleted together. If the administrator wants to withdraw from the company without deleting the company, the administrator needs to delegate permission to another member, and then withdraw from the company.

section.title: Edit and Add Company Information
section.para: The company information displayed in the My profile > company menu can be edited in the Manage company > Company profile menu. Company profile

note.para: Only the Company administrator or Company managers can perform this action.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage company > Company profile menu.
Edit the information you want to change in the Company profile > Basic information tab.
Save the edited information by clicking the Save button.

section.title: Company Brand
section.para: Company brand You can replace the eformsign logo and symbol with your company logo and symbol by registering them in the Company profile > Company brand tab.

note.para: Both a logo and a symbol are representative images of the company. Usually, a logo has a long horizontal format that includes its brand name, and a symbol has only a square image.
On eformsign, 512 pixel X 128 pixel horizontal image size is recommended for logos, and 120 pixel X 120 pixel square image size is recommended for symbols.

para.emphasis: Registering the Company Logo and Symbol

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage company > Company profile menu.
Click the Company brand tab.
Click the image in the Brand image > Logo box.
Select and upload a logo image file from your PC.
Image size: 512 pixel x 128 pixel image size recommended
File size: Up to maximum 300 KB
File format: PNG, JPG, JPEG, and GIF
Apply your changes by clicking the Save button.
Check whether the new logo is applied to the dashboard.

section.title: Permissions
section.para: eformsign provides the following five types of roles that can be granted to members based on their permissions.

listitem.para: Company administrator The company administrator is a representative of the company and has all permissions for using the eformsign service.
Company manager Company managers have permission to access the Manage company menu. The company managers can view and edit company, group and member information and grant permissions to members.

Template manager Template managers have permission to access the Manage template menu. The template managers can create new templates by using Form builder or Web form designer, and also can edit, deploy, and delete templates.
Document managers have permission to access the Manage document menu to view and download documents created from each template. Document manager The document managers can be set for each template.
Template usage Template usage (=document creation) permission can be granted to members by each template. Only the member with the template usage permission can create documents from that template.

section.title: Company Administrator
section.para: Company administrator The user who created the company is the company administrator by default, and the company administrator is a super administrator with all permissions to use the eformsign service.
The company administrator

listitem.para: Has access to all the menus.
Can create, edit, delete, and manage templates.
Can create, view, and manage all documents.
Can delegate its role to another member when the company administrator needed to be changed.

section.para: When the company administrator deletes the eformsign account, the company will also be deleted together. If the administrator wants to delete only the account, delegate the administrator permission to another member, and then delete the account. Delegating the Company administrator permission

note.para: Only the Company administrator can perform this action.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage company > Company profile menu.
Click the Edit button in the Detailed information tab, and then click the Delegate role button on the right side of the Administrator item.
Select a member to delegate the company administrator role in the Delegate role pop-up window.
Enter the password of the company administrator.
Click the Save button to save the change.

section.title: Company Manager
section.para: Company manager Company managers can access the Manage company menu and can view, edit, and delete the information regarding the company and groups/members.

note.para: The company administrator or company managers can grant the company manager permissions to members.
Only the Company administrator or Template managers can perform this action.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage company > Manage members menu.
Select a member to grant permission to manage templates in the member list.
Tick the Manage company checkbox in the Permission item, displayed at the bottom of the Member info tab on the member list's right side.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Template Manager Permissions
section.para: Template manager permissions Template managers can access to the Manage template menu, and can register, edit, deploy, and delete templates.
A template manager who registered the template is the template owner by default.
However, if several template managers exist in the company, the template managers and the template owners may differ.
If the template manager is not the template owner, the manager can only view the template settings and duplicate the template.

note.para: Only the Company administrator or Template managers can perform this action.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage company > Manage members menu.
Select a member to grant permission to manage templates in the member list.
Tick the Manage templates checkbox in the Permission item, displayed at the bottom of the Member info tab on the member list's right side.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Template Usage (=Document Creation) and Document Management Permissions
section.para:
Template usage
Document management Template usage permission allows users to create documents from the templates, and document management permission allows users to manage created documents and data.
The members with the Template usage permissions can create documents using the template in the New document page.
The members with the Document management permissions can view, delete, and download the documents created from the template in the Manage documents page.

para.emphasis: Granting Permissions for Template Usage and Document Management

note.para: Only the Company administrator or Template managers can perform this action.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the Manage templates menu.
Go to the Set permissions tab.
Select groups or members for each permission to be granted.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Manage Groups and Members
section.para:
You can invite, delete, and edit members, and create, add, and delete groups in the Manage company menu.
Manage groups
Manage members

section.title: Manage Members
section.para: You can invite members to the company or manage invited members in the Manage members menu. Manage members

listitem.para: Active members You can view the list and information of the active members of the company.
Inactive members You can view the list and information of the inactive members.
Invited members You can view the list and information of the invited members.
You can view, edit, or delete the member information in the Member info tab on the right side by clicking the member in the list.
You can view member information, change member status, and grant permissions including Manage company and Manage templates to members.
You can set the field values that are related to the members.
Transfer documents If a member no longer uses the eformsign service, the documents of the member can be transferred to other members.
Bulk-invite You can invite several members at once.
Invite members You can invite members via email or ID.
When you click the Recycle Bin icon, the checkboxes will be activated on the member list's left column. Tick the members to delete and click the Delete button.

section.title: Manage Groups
section.para: You can create groups in the company and view, edit, or delete the group information.

listitem.para: When you click the group on the list, you can view the group name and description of the group on the right side. You can also edit the information in the Group information tab.
You can view the list of the members in the group and can add or remove members from the group.
You can set the field values that are related to the group.
When you click the Create a group button, the Create a group pop-up window will be displayed. Enter the group name, description, and search and add members to create the group.
When you click the Recycle Bin icon, the checkboxes will be activated on the group list's left column. Tick the group to delete and click the Delete button.

section.title: My Signature
section.para: If you register your signature, initial, and stamp in the My signature menu, you can easily use them when processing documents. My signature

note.para: You can register your Signature and Initial in the PC, mobile, and application.

listitem.para: Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the My signature menu.
Click the OK button to add a new signature, initial or stamp.
You can draw your signature on the screen.
Type your name, and then select a signature style.
QR code If you scan the QR code with your smartphone camera, you can access the sign pad page. Draw your signature on the sign pad.
Push notification Select a mobile device that you want to connect and click the Send button. You can draw your signature using the eformsign app installed on the device connected.
Click the OK button to save the signature.
Click the Edit or Delete buttons to edit or delete the signature.

section.para: Register stamp Some documents may require a seal or stamp rather than a signature or initial. You can apply a stamped image to documents after registering the image in the eformsign service.

note.para: Preparing a stamped image is required.

listitem.para: Image type: PNG, JPG
File size: Maximum of 300 KB
Click the sidebar menu icon, and go to the My signature menu.
Click the Register button to add new stamp.
Click the image area, and then a pop-up window will be displayed where you can upload an image from your PC. Select the image that you want to register.
Click the OK button to save the stamp.
Click the Edit or Delete buttons to edit or delete the registered stamp.
